code: import React from'react';import"./SearchForm.css";import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{Submit,LableChange}from"../redusers/Form";import punkBeersSerwises from"../serwises/punkBeersSerwises";import{takeItems}from"../redusers/Beers";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SearchForm(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var lable=useSelector(function(state){return state.Form.lable;});var BeersSerwises=new punkBeersSerwises();var Beers=useSelector(function(state){return state.Beers.items;});var onSubmit=function onSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();BeersSerwises.getAllBeers("/beers?beer_name=".concat(lable)).then(function(beers){dispatch(takeItems(beers));}).catch();};var onLableChange=function onLableChange(e){e.preventDefault();dispatch(LableChange(e.target.value));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("center",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ItemSearch",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"d-flex",onSubmit:onSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",placeholder:"neds",onChange:onLableChange,value:lable}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-outline-secondary",children:"  Search "})]})})});}export default SearchForm;
